display_long_description:
**SURVIVE THE APOCALYPSE ON FOUR WHEELS!🚗💨**

Grab the wheel and drive to survive in the ultimate post-apocalyptic road trip. This is your story. Your journey. Your rules of survival.
## **🤝 TEAM UP OR GO SOLO**

 Survive with friends in up to 4-player co-op, or brave the desolate roads alone. When you're solo, all the loot is yours, but so are all the dangers. The choice is yours.
## **🔧 BUILD YOUR ROLLING FORTRESS**

 Your car is more than a vehicle—it's your lifeline. Scavenge for parts, bolt on armor, mount powerful weapons, and turn your ride into a zombie-shredding machine.
## **⚔️ FIGHT THE DEAD AND THE LIVING**

 The undead are predictable, but the living are far more dangerous. Battle relentless zombie hordes and outsmart cunning human gangs who want your car, your supplies, and your life.
## **💥 CREATE YOUR OWN MAYHEM**

 This world is your chaotic playground. Use physics to your advantage—send zombies flying with a reinforced bumper, or create explosive traps for unsuspecting gangs. If you can see it, you can probably break it.
## **🍔 SURVIVE BEYOND THE BASICS**

 This isn't just about fighting. Scavenge for food and water, and yes, even find a safe place to answer nature's call. Neglect your needs, and become just another corpse on the road.
